lyrics.text: Lesson 23. A new house. First listen and then answer the question.
lyrics.translation: 第23课。新房子。首先听，然后回答问题。

lyrics.text: Why is the new house special? I had a letter from my sister yesterday.
lyrics.translation: 新房子为什么特别？我昨天收到了妹妹的来信。

lyrics.text: She lives in Nigeria. In her letter she said that she would come to England next year.
lyrics.translation: 她住在尼日利亚。在她的信中，她说她明年会来英国。

lyrics.text: If she comes she will get a surprise. We are now living in a beautiful new house in the country.
lyrics.translation: 如果她来了，她会大吃一惊。我们现在住在乡下的一栋漂亮的新房子里。

lyrics.text: Work on it had begun before my sister left. The house was completed five months ago.
lyrics.translation: 在我姐姐离开之前就开始了这项工作。这所房子五个月前就完成了。

lyrics.text: In my letter I told her that she could stay with us. The house has many large rooms and there is a lovely garden.
lyrics.translation: 在我的信中，我告诉她她可以和我们住在一起。这所房子有很多大房间，还有一个美丽的花园。

lyrics.text: It is a very modern house so it looks strange to some people. It must be the only modern house in the district.
lyrics.translation: 这是一座非常现代的房子，所以对一些人来说看起来很奇怪。它一定是这个地区唯一的现代房子。
